document_data.caption: A map of [[Silverymoon]] with the Ghostwalk highlighted in red.
document_data.name: Ghostwalk
document_data.Description: The Ghostwalk was located in [[Northbank]]. Running west to east for under 500 feet, it began at [[Dancer's Mask Lane]] in the west—across from the [[Golden Oak]] inn—crossed [[Bowshot Ride]] and the [[Moonway]], and ended at the [[Old Wall]].
